package.name: marble_qav500_sensor_config_1
package.description: The marble_qav500_sensor_config_1 package is derived from marble's air vehicle system's submission. This sensor configuration has: - a 3D Lidar, Ouster OS1-64 (on underside) - an Intel realsense D435 (RGBD camera) - air pressure sensor - magnetometer - Microstrain 3DM-GX5-15 IMU - 2 Pico flexx cameras, one facing up towards ceiling, other facing down towards ground.
package.author: Derek Vasquez
Hector Escobar
